azurerm_subnet_nat_gateway_association.description: Associates a [NAT Gateway](nat_gateway.html) with a [Subnet](subnet.html) within a [Virtual Network](virtual_network.html).

nat_gateway_id.description: The ID of the NAT Gateway which should be associated with the Subnet. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the Subnet. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

create.description: Used when creating the Subnet NAT Gateway Association.

update.description: Used when updating the Subnet NAT Gateway Association.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Subnet NAT Gateway Association.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Subnet NAT Gateway Association.
